template.value: 把一个变量(类名或多行代码)转成全大写字母：Command + Shift + U，再按一下切换回来 将当前行上移或下移：option + Shift + 上(下)箭头; 清除无用引用 快捷键：control + option + O（字母 O 键） 多行注释/**/：option + command + / 或者选中多行 ：command + / 左移代码： 选中代码后 按 shift+Tab即可实现左移操作。 Command+Shift+Enter 补全当前语句，添加缺失的圆括号、大括号、花括号和格式等。 Command+J 插入自定义动态代码模板

template.name: regexnote
template.value: /// ==================== 正则表达式快速浏览（速查） ==================== /// 【字符】 abc… 普通字符，逐字匹配 . 任意单个字符（不含换行） \. 匹配英文句号 . /// 【数字 / 字母】 123… 数字字符 \d 任意数字（等价于 [0-9]） \D 任意非数字字符 \w 字母 / 数字 / 下划线（[a-zA-Z0-9_]） \W 非字母数字字符 /// 【字符集合】 [abc] 匹配 a / b / c 中任意一个 [^abc] 匹配非 a / b / c 的字符 [a-z] a 到 z [A-Z] A 到 Z [0-9] 0 到 9 /// 【数量限定】 {m} 恰好 m 次 {m,n} m 到 n 次 * 0 次或多次 + 1 次或多次 ? 可选（0 或 1 次） /// 【空白】 \s 任意空白字符 \S 非空白字符 /// 【位置锚点】 ^ 行首 $ 行尾 ^…$ 整体匹配 /// 【分组 / 捕获】 (…) 捕获分组 (a(bc)) 嵌套捕获 (.*) 贪婪匹配全部 /// 【或条件】 (abc|def) 匹配 abc 或 def 【常见组合】 ^\d+$ 纯数字 ^[a-zA-Z]+$ 纯字母 ^\w+$ 字母 / 数字 / 下划线 ^\S+$ 不含任何空白 ^.{n}$ 固定长度 n ★★★★☆ 高频校验 ^\d{6}$ 6 位验证码 ^\d{11}$ 11 位手机号（不含区号） ^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$ 字母数字混合 ^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$ 常见用户名 /// =====================================================================

gitignorefile
template.value:
# Miscellaneous *.class *.lock *.log *.pyc *.swp .DS_Store .atom/ .buildlog/ .history .svn/
# IntelliJ related *.iml *.ipr *.iws .idea/
# Visual Studio Code related .classpath .project .settings/ .vscode/*
# Flutter repo-specific /bin/cache/ /bin/internal/bootstrap.bat /bin/internal/bootstrap.sh /bin/mingit/ /dev/benchmarks/mega_gallery/ /dev/bots/.recipe_deps /dev/bots/android_tools/ /dev/devicelab/ABresults*.json /dev/docs/doc/ /dev/docs/flutter.docs.zip /dev/docs/lib/ /dev/docs/pubspec.yaml /dev/integration_tests/**/xcuserdata /dev/integration_tests/**/Pods /packages/flutter/coverage/ version analysis_benchmark.json
# packages file containing multi-root paths .packages.generated
# Flutter/Dart/Pub related **/doc/api/ .dart_tool/ .flutter-plugins .flutter-plugins-dependencies **/generated_plugin_registrant.dart .packages .pub-preload-cache/ .pub/ build/ flutter_*.png linked_*.ds unlinked.ds unlinked_spec.ds
# Android related **/android/**/gradle-wrapper.jar .gradle/ **/android/captures/ **/android/gradlew **/android/gradlew.bat **/android/local.properties **/android/**/GeneratedPluginRegistrant.java **/android/key.properties *.jks
# iOS/XCode related **/ios/**/*.mode1v3 **/ios/**/*.mode2v3 **/ios/**/*.moved-aside **/ios/**/*.pbxuser **/ios/**/*.perspectivev3 **/ios/**/*sync/ **/ios/**/.sconsign.dblite **/ios/**/.tags* **/ios/**/.vagrant/ **/ios/**/DerivedData/ **/ios/**/Icon? **/ios/**/Pods/ **/ios/**/.symlinks/ **/ios/**/profile **/ios/**/xcuserdata **/ios/.generated/ **/ios/Flutter/.last_build_id **/ios/Flutter/App.framework **/ios/Flutter/Flutter.framework **/ios/Flutter/Flutter.podspec **/ios/Flutter/Generated.xcconfig **/ios/Flutter/ephemeral **/ios/Flutter/app.flx **/ios/Flutter/app.zip **/ios/Flutter/flutter_assets/ **/ios/Flutter/flutter_export_environment.sh **/ios/ServiceDefinitions.json **/ios/Runner/GeneratedPluginRegistrant.*
# macOS **/Flutter/ephemeral/ **/Pods/ **/macos/Flutter/GeneratedPluginRegistrant.swift **/macos/Flutter/ephemeral **/xcuserdata/
# Windows **/windows/flutter/generated_plugin_registrant.cc **/windows/flutter/generated_plugin_registrant.h **/windows/flutter/generated_plugins.cmake
# Linux **/linux/flutter/generated_plugin_registrant.cc **/linux/flutter/generated_plugin_registrant.h **/linux/flutter/generated_plugins.cmake
# Coverage coverage/
# Symbols app.*.symbols
# Exceptions to above rules. !**/ios/**/default.mode1v3 !**/ios/**/default.mode2v3 !**/ios/**/default.pbxuser !**/ios/**/default.perspectivev3 !/packages/flutter_tools/test/data/dart_dependencies_test/**/.packages !/dev/ci/**/Gemfile.lock !.vscode/settings.json

iosadhoc
template.value: /* iOS 打包adhoc步骤： 1，cd 到ios文件夹下 2， flutter build ios --dart-define-from-file=release.json --no-tree-shake-icons --release 3， xcodebuild -workspace Runner.xcworkspace -scheme Runner -sdk iphoneos -configuration Release archive -archivePath $PWD/build/Runner.xcarchive 4，将ExportOptions.plist文件放入iOS文件夹 5， xcodebuild -exportArchive -exportOptionsPlist ExportOptions.plist -archivePath $PWD/build/Runner.xcarchive -exportPath $PWD/adhoc -allowProvisioningUpdates 6， open ./adhoc */ */ /* <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1.0"> <dict> <key>destination</key> <string>export</string> <key>method</key> <string>ad-hoc</string> <key>provisioningProfiles</key> <dict> <key>com.im.jim</key> <string>imJim_adhoc</string> <key>com.im.jim.ImagePublish</key> <string>com.im.jim.ImagePublish_adhoc</string> <key>com.im.jim.NotificationService</key> <string>com.im.jim.NotificationService_adhoc</string> </dict> <key>signingCertificate</key> <string>Apple Distribution</string> <key>signingStyle</key> <string>manual</string> <key>stripSwiftSymbols</key> <true/> <key>teamID</key> <string>T882LZ87PX</string> <key>uploadBitcode</key> <false/> <key>uploadSymbols</key> <false/> </dict> </plist> */
